cu.explanation_en: Setting Num_Threads_PUSCH to a negative value will cause thread allocation failure and prevent the CU from initializing properly.

du.explanation_en: Setting do_CSIRS to a negative value will cause configuration validation error and prevent the DU from starting properly.
du.explanation_zh: 將 do_CSIRS 設定為負值會導致配置驗證錯誤，並阻止 DU 正確啟動。
